# King's Castle (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Teleportation Spells|teleportation]])

**Level:** [[4th Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 230

This spell allows you to switch places with an ally. When you cast this spell, choose a single ally within range. You teleport to your allyâ€™s space while your ally teleports to your former space.
